<script>
export default {
    name: 'Formulario',
    data: () => ({
        otpAccoutn: [],
        alert: false,
        alertText: '',
        
    }),
    mounted () {
    
//////////////// Opciones de cuentas

        this.otpAccoutn = this.$store.state.cuentas.map(res => {
                return {
                    text: '****'+ String(res.account).substr(5,9),
                    value: res.account
                }
            })
    },

methods: {

//////////////// Transferencia

    transfer(){
       if(this.$store.state.newTransfer.fromAccount == ''){
            this.alert = true
            this.alertText = 'La cuenta no puede estar vacia'
       }else if(this.$store.state.newTransfer.toAccount == ''){
            this.alert = true
            this.alertText = 'Eldestino esta vacio'
       }else if(this.$store.state.newTransfer.amount.value == ''){
            this.alert = true
            this.alertText = 'El monto esta vacio'
       }

//////////////// Limpiar formulario

    resetForm(){
       this.$refs.formTransfer.reset()
    }
},
}
